description: Includes Laboratory Notebook (5%), Revision Quizzes (5%), and Individual Short Report 2 (25%). Involves recording experiments during lab sessions, completing online revision activities, and submitting a 5-page scientific report on experimental work conducted in the laboratory component.
A 5-page written scientific report on experimental work conducted in the laboratory component, submitted in Week 7. Focuses on protein purification, analysis techniques, and scientific communication.

2-hour exam testing theoretical material from lectures, typically using essay or short response formats. Covers protein science research areas, analytical techniques, and modern protein characterization methods.
1-hour test in Week 4 assessing lecture material from the first three weeks. Features automatically marked questions (e.g., multiple choice) with cohort feedback on performance strengths/weaknesses.
